name: $enterer
desc: A person, animal, organization or device that who actually and principally carries out the activity

name: $performer
desc: A party that originates the resource and therefore has responsibility for the information given in the resource and ownership of this resource

name: $author
desc: A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of activity

name: $verifier
desc: A verifier who attests to the accuracy of the resource

name: $attester
desc: A person who reported information that contributed to the resource

name: $informant
desc: The entity that is accountable for maintaining a true an accurate copy of the original record

name: $custodian
desc: A device that operates independently of an author on custodian's algorithms for data extraction of existing information for purpose of generating a new artifact.

name: $assembler
desc: A device used by an author to record new information, which may also be used by the author to select existing information for aggregation with newly recorded information for the purpose of generating a new artifact.
